title.en: HELCOM HEAT (3): Compute the Annual Indicator (HOLAS Mode)

description.en: Compute the HELCOM Annual Indicator for the HEAT assessment tool. HOLAS mode means that for the HOLAS periods, default spatial grids, configuration and default data is provided, which you can just use. This process represents subpart 3 of the original HEAT assessment computation script. For more info, please go to: https://github.com/ices-tools-prod/HEAT/tree/master

links.title: GitHub repo for the original HEAT analysis

assessment_period.title: Assessment Period
assessment_period.description: Ask HELCOM. Example: HOLAS-2 (2011-2016), HOLAS-3 (2016-2021), or Other (1877-9999).

samples.title: Station samples (combined)
samples.description: Merged sample data of BOT, PMP and CTD data for indicator calculation (StationSamples.csv).

combined_Chlorophylla_IsWeighted.title: Chlorophyll A Weighted?
combined_Chlorophylla_IsWeighted.description: If true, script calculates combined chlorophyll a indicator results per assessment unit as a weighted average from BOT, PMP and EO. If false, then simple average.

annual_indicators.title: Annual Indicators Table
annual_indicators.description: CSV file of calculated HEAT EQRS per indicator per year per assessment unit (AnnualIndicators.csv).
